name: Checkered Flag
description:
Checkered Flag is a racing video game, released for the Atari Lynx in 1991, and for the Atari Jaguar in 1994.

A sequel was originally planned for the Jaguar under the name Checkered Flag 2, but the game was redesigned and retitled "Redline Racing". Destination Software also planned to release a Game Boy Advance version of the title around 2005, but it was canceled before it was released.
